Field.DisplayName: Do you remove it from the NT version output?
Field.Description: Parameters marked with ○ are excluded in the NT version package.
Parameters marked with a circle are excluded from all packages (because they are for debugging).

Please enter the map number to be played back as an 8-digit number. This is the map number used as the reference in the cutscene. If you do not specify the correct map number, the playback position will shift.

Please enter the map number required for display as an 8-digit number. This parameter is used by the guest as a list to determine if the cutscene can be played. If you don't need it, you can leave it as 0 or blank.

Please enter the map number required for display as an 8-digit number. This parameter is used by the guest as a list to determine if the cutscene can be played. If you don't need it, you can leave it as 0 or blank.

Please enter the map number required for display as an 8-digit number. This parameter is used by the guest as a list to determine if the cutscene can be played. If you don't need it, you can leave it as 0 or blank.

Field.DisplayName: Hit part ID for calculating camera position during loading
Field.Description: Hit part ID for calculating camera position during loading

Field.DisplayName: Waiting time when cannot be displayed [seconds]
Field.Description: The number of seconds used to display the progress of the loading screen progress bar that is displayed when the guest side cannot play in the multi. [GR] SEQ22843 [Cutscene] Players who have not read the map number required for display during cutscene playback will see the screen go dark.

Field.DisplayName: Hit parts waiting to be read 0
Field.Description: Hit parts waiting to be read 0

Field.DisplayName: Hit parts waiting to be read 1
Field.Description: Hit parts waiting to be read 1
